name: SWYAM
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom fan”
”Alexa, turn off hall light”
”Alexa, set bedroom fan to maximum speed”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
SWYAM offers the most comprehensive voice controlled smart home experience with Alexa. Control your home hands free, just command it and consider it done.

Here’s a step by step guide:
1. Download Swyam Smart Home App from app store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=mi.smarthome
2. Login with the google account.
3. Setup the device with your "SWYAM" app, and make sure you can control it in the app.
4. Open Alexa app, search "SWYAM" skill and enable it by signing in with the same google ID you used in mobile app.
5. Discover devices and experience the power of voice, just say it and done.

Here are the voice commands SWYAM has:

FAN:
Alexa, turn on the fan
Alexa, set the fan speed to 2
Alexa, set the fan speed to maximum


SOCKET/PLUG:
Alexa, turn on the smart plug
Alexa, turn off the smart plug


SWITCH:
Alexa, turn on the switch
Alexa, turn off the switch


STRIP:
Alexa, turn on the strip1
Alexa, turn off the strip4
